name: NONNATIVE
description:
You have crashed on an alien planet, and have no choice but to progress through nonnative land by killing aliens, collecting power ups, spawning bosses, and solving puzzles. 

NONNATIVE features an increasing game play speed, as the player progresses through room upon room, searching for any way to escape alien territory. Each room is either an arena room, where the player must survive long enough to spawn that room's boss, kill it and collect its key, or it is a puzzle room, in which the player must have every button down at the same time, all the while both navigating around, and using, gem-changing lasers, RESET buttons, and color-specific walls. The player must also decide to spend their hard-earned points on either saving their progress in this unforgiving game, or risking it all and purchasing a new skill from the ever-expanding skills tree, hoping they will reach the next room with enough points to save.

Can you reach the end?

CONTROLS:

Keyboard/Mouse:

wasd-Player Movement

Cursor-Player Aiming

Left Mouse Button - Shoot/Throw Gem/Key

Right Mouse Button- Reload

Middle Mouse Button - Lock Cursor Position

Controller (PC/PS3/PS4/XBOX):

Left Stick-Player Movement

Right Stick-Player Aiming

Bottom Right Trigger-Shoot/Throw Gem/Key

Button 1- Reload

**PLEASE DONATE**

**A NEW ROOM WILL BE ADDED FOR EVERY $5 MADE**

***The game-play video is not of the most recent update***

All proceeds go straight back into NONNATIVE to fund the development of an app, online play, and more rooms.

Because this game is currently in development, it has a lot of room to sway. Please leave any suggestions, things you enjoy, or things you would like to see in the comments sections. All suggestions will be seriously considered, and based on funding/time, may be implemented. You, as a player, have the choice to influence the game in many ways, please let us know what you would like to see.
